This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Redirect count should be limited (same-origin) 
PASS Redirect count should be limited (cross-origin) 
PASS Two XHRs both redirects 20 time should success (same-origin) 
PASS Two XHRs both redirects 20 time should success (cross-origin) 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
